Replying to @NadiehBremer 2018-04-03 15:49
@NadiehBremer Oh yeah! There's no way to do that automatically via the Netlify admin UI, but you can serve each site on Netlify, then gather them together in your main site via redirects. You'll need to take care of your root URLs in paths, of course. I recommend a netlify.toml for configs https://t.co/nv0I8InUcr
